headline: Meta’s (META) AI Push Mirrors Metaverse Risks, Says Oppenheimer
summary: Meta Platforms, Inc. (NASDAQ:META) is one of the AI Stocks on the Market’s Radar. On October 30, Oppenheimer downgraded the stock to “Perform” from Outperform without a price target. headline: Murdoch-backed Brave Bison in £50m bid for M&C Saatchi division
summary: A deal-hungry London-listed marketing group backed by Rupert Murdoch and Lord Ashcroft, the former Tory treasurer, has made a £50m approach to buy a division of M&C Saatchi.  Sky News has learnt that Brave Bison, run by brothers Oli and Theo Green, has tabled a cash-and-stock proposal to acquire M&C Performance.  M&C Performance's clients include Amazon and Meta, the owner of Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp.
